flashcards.kikuyu: Mũndũ Mũgĩ ndarĩ mĩhere ya ũhoro
flashcards.english: A clever person does not need too much explaining
flashcards.cultural_notes: A compliment suggesting that a wise or intelligent person can grasp an idea quickly without needing elaborate detail

sub_translations.english: does not need methods of giving information

flashcards.kikuyu: Andũ matarĩ ndundu mahũragwo na njũgũma ĩmwe
flashcards.english: People not united are beaten with one club
flashcards.cultural_notes: Emphasizes the power of unity; those who are not united are easily defeated or exploited by even a single force

flashcards.english: A tree is straightened when young
flashcards.cultural_notes: Implied meaning: Do not wait till your kids are adults - teach them while they're young
